Html:
I have a bar chart with two series.

The first data point of the first and the last data point of the second are displayed only a have of their width and are cut. There should be an offset from the axis or it should start with the axis but not cut off.

Any simple solution for that issue?

It sounds like maybe you're plotting the BarSeries with a LinearAxis IndependentAxis, so the bars are centered on the axis values. If you use a CategoryAxis instead, the bars should be placed inside their corresponding slots and this should work as you want.
